languages.text:
Если персонаж в свой ход не двигался или получил эффект {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживание{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывание{/g}, он получает временное здоровье, равное {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
Если персонаж обладает убеждением Схизматик, все его союзники немедленно получают столько же временного здоровья.
languages.original_text:
If the wearer did not move during their turn or became {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, they gain temporary wounds equal to {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
If the wearer has Conviction — Iconoclast, all their allies immediately gain the same number of temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text:
Если персонаж в свой ход не двигался или получил эффект {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживание{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывание{/g}, он получает временное здоровье, равное {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
Если персонаж обладает убеждением Схизматик, все его союзники немедленно получают столько же временного здоровья.

Если персонаж в свой ход не двигался или получил эффект {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживание{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывание{/g}, он получает временное здоровье, равное <u>максимальному числу своих ОП</u>.
Если персонаж обладает убеждением Схизматик, все его союзники немедленно получают столько же временного здоровья.

Если персонаж в свой ход не двигался или получил эффект {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживание{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедление{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидывание{/g}, он получает временное здоровье, равное <u>максимальному числу своих ОП</u>.
Если персонаж обладает убеждением Схизматик, все его союзники немедленно получают столько же временного здоровья.

languages.text:
If the wearer did not move during their turn or became {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, they gain temporary wounds equal to {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
If the wearer has Conviction — Iconoclast, all their allies immediately gain the same number of temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text:
If the wearer did not move during their turn or became {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, they gain temporary wounds equal to {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
If the wearer has Conviction — Iconoclast, all their allies immediately gain the same number of temporary wounds.

If the wearer did not move during their turn or was immobilized, slowed, stunned, or knocked prone, they gain temporary wounds equal to <u>(2 × maximum MP)</u>.
If the wearer has Conviction — Iconoclast, all their allies immediately gain the same number of temporary wounds.

If the wearer did not move during their turn or was immobilized, slowed, stunned, or knocked prone, they gain temporary wounds equal to <u>(2 × maximum MP)</u>.
If the wearer has Conviction — Iconoclast, all their allies immediately gain the same number of temporary wounds.

If the wearer did not move during their turn or became {g|f:4f13e446713f440bbc30e8d216bc9f1e}immobilised{/g}, {g|f:a7841f4596694e508c302b5ffab92753}slowed{/g}, {g|f:f1c0c6bee3c54cc694c1d1746eafcb15}stunned{/g}, or knocked {g|f:8de915da52f24d9bb925d13fb2c8cf98}prone{/g}, they gain temporary wounds equal to <u>(2 × maximum MP)</u>.
If the wearer has Conviction — Iconoclast, all their allies immediately gain the same number of temporary wounds.

If the wearer did not move during their turn or became {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, they gain temporary wounds equal to <u>maximum MP</u>.
If the wearer has Conviction — Iconoclast, all their allies immediately gain the same number of temporary wounds.

languages.text:
Si el portador no se ha movido durante su turno o ha quedado {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}, gana heridas temporales iguales a {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
Si el portador tiene Convicción: Iconoclasta, todos sus aliados ganan inmediatamente la misma cantidad de heridas temporales.
languages.original_text:
If the wearer did not move during their turn or became {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, they gain temporary wounds equal to {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
If the wearer has Conviction — Iconoclast, all their allies immediately gain the same number of temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text:
Si el portador no se ha movido durante su turno o ha quedado {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}, gana heridas temporales iguales a <u>(2 × PM máximos)</u>.
Si el portador tiene Convicción: Iconoclasta, todos sus aliados ganan inmediatamente la misma cantidad de heridas temporales.

Si el portador no se ha movido durante su turno o ha quedado {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}, gana heridas temporales iguales a {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
Si el portador tiene Convicción: Iconoclasta, todos sus aliados ganan inmediatamente la misma cantidad de heridas temporales.

languages.text:
使用者が自分のターンで移動しなかった、または{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}、突き飛ばされて{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱{/g}になった場合、使用者は{uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}と同量の一時体力を得る。
使用者が信念 — 革新主義を持っている場合、仲間全員が即座に同じ量の一時体力を得る。
languages.original_text:
If the wearer did not move during their turn or became {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, they gain temporary wounds equal to {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
If the wearer has Conviction — Iconoclast, all their allies immediately gain the same number of temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が自分のターンで移動しなかった、または{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}、突き飛ばされて{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱{/g}になった場合、使用者は<u>(2 × 最大 MP)</u>と同量の一時体力を得る。
使用者が信念 — 革新主義を持っている場合、仲間全員が即座に同じ量の一時体力を得る。

使用者が自分のターンで移動しなかった、または{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}、突き飛ばされて{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱{/g}になった場合、使用者は{uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}と同量の一時体力を得る。
使用者が信念 — 革新主義を持っている場合、仲間全員が即座に同じ量の一時体力を得る。

languages.text:
如果装备者在自己的回合中没有移动，也没有陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，则会获得临时生命值，等同于{uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}。
如果装备者拥有信念：自由主义，则所有盟友也会立刻获得相同数量的临时生命值。
languages.original_text:
If the wearer did not move during their turn or became {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, they gain temporary wounds equal to {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
If the wearer has Conviction — Iconoclast, all their allies immediately gain the same number of temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text:
如果装备者在自己的回合中没有移动，也没有陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，则会获得临时生命值，等同于<u>（2×最大移动点数）</u>。
如果装备者拥有信念：自由主义，则所有盟友也会立刻获得相同数量的临时生命值。

如果装备者在自己的回合中没有移动，也没有陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，则会获得临时生命值，等同于{uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}。
如果装备者拥有信念：自由主义，则所有盟友也会立刻获得相同数量的临时生命值。

languages.text:
Si le porteur ne s'est pas déplacé pendant son tour ou qu'il a subi l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}, il gagne des blessures temporaires à hauteur de {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
Si le porteur a Conviction — Iconoclaste, tous ses alliés gagnent immédiatement le même nombre de blessures temporaires.
languages.original_text:
If the wearer did not move during their turn or became {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, they gain temporary wounds equal to {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
If the wearer has Conviction — Iconoclast, all their allies immediately gain the same number of temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text:
Si le porteur ne s'est pas déplacé pendant son tour ou qu'il a subi l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}, il gagne des blessures temporaires à hauteur de <u>(2 × PD maximum)</u>.
Si le porteur a Conviction — Iconoclaste, tous ses alliés gagnent immédiatement le même nombre de blessures temporaires.

Si le porteur ne s'est pas déplacé pendant son tour ou qu'il a subi l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}, il gagne des blessures temporaires à hauteur de {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
Si le porteur a Conviction — Iconoclaste, tous ses alliés gagnent immédiatement le même nombre de blessures temporaires.

languages.text:
Wenn sich der Träger während seines Zuges nicht bewegt hat oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}bewegungsunfähig{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g} war, erhält er temporäre Wunden in Höhe von {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
Hat der Träger "Überzeugung — Ikonoklast", erhalten alle Verbündeten sofort dieselbe Anzahl temporärer Wunden.
languages.original_text:
If the wearer did not move during their turn or became {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, or knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, they gain temporary wounds equal to {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
If the wearer has Conviction — Iconoclast, all their allies immediately gain the same number of temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text:
Wenn sich der Träger während seines Zuges nicht bewegt hat oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}bewegungsunfähig{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g} war, erhält er temporäre Wunden in Höhe von <u>(2 × max. BP)</u>.
Hat der Träger "Überzeugung – Ikonoklast", erhalten alle Verbündeten sofort dieselbe Anzahl temporärer Wunden.

Wenn sich der Träger während seines Zuges nicht bewegt hat oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}bewegungsunfähig{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g} war, erhält er temporäre Wunden in Höhe von {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685}.
Hat der Träger "Überzeugung – Ikonoklast", erhalten alle Verbündeten sofort dieselbe Anzahl temporärer Wunden.

languages.text:
Takan kişi; turu esnasında hareket etmemişse veya {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felce{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlamaya{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemliğe{/g} ya da {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilmeye{/g} maruz kalmışsa {uip|THP|d1db3deaf73d415ca8a0b3a9e3652685} kadar geçici sağlık puanı kazanır.
Takan kişi, Kanaat — Ezber Bozan sahibiyse tüm dost birimleri de anında aynı miktarda geçici sağlık puanı kazanır.

If the wearer has Conviction — Iconoclast, all their allies immediately gain the same number of temporary wounds.
